description:
Google has announced the alpha release of Genkit for Go, an open-source framework designed to empower Go developers (“gophers”) in building AI applications and cloud services. A result of collaboration between the Firebase and Go teams, Genkit for Go aims to combine Go’s simplicity, scalability, and security with Genkit’s robust libraries and tools. Genkit for... Read more »

The post Genkit for Go: Google’s AI framework for gophers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Genkit for Go: Google’s AI framework for gophers
